Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:




Nemesis Enforcer checked the scanners in the Alliance bridge.

"Heh.  Those Oblitercons and DevilDuer are under attack.  Might as well help 
'em, seeing how I have nothing better to do." he activated his comm.  
"Scattershot, go to _________ and engage some Maxis.  I'll be following 
behind you and --"

~YES SIR!  CAN DO!  DEATH TO THE ALLIANCE, HAHAHAHA!~

Nemesis Enforcer didn't move.  "Yeeesss...good for you." he ended the comm, 
and transformed to his giant bat mode, using his wings to go through the air, 
heading for the nearest exit.

---

Scattershot, in his bald eagle mode, activated the boosters in his tail, 
launching off towards the battle where Oblitertron had been at.
